name: prlem2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3
body: |- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3))))

stmt.origin: pm4.71ri(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wo(w0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3))))
-| wi(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wo(w0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3))))
-| wi(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wo(w0, w2))

stmt.origin: orim12i(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3), w0, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wo(w0, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w0)
-| wi(wa(w2, w3), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3))))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w0)
-| wi(wa(w2, w3), w2)

|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3))))
-| wi(wa(w2, w3), w2)
|- wb(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wa(wo(w0, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3))))

comment: A specialized lemma for set theory (to derive the Axiom of Pairing). (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 13-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 9-Dec-2012.)
